Spinning & Drifting in South Africa

The Love and Support

Learn More

Main Team Players

TEAM BGB

Team BGB is one of the bestest spinning teams of South Africa and has one of the largest number of supporters and drivers. Showcasing exceptional vehicles, from personal vehicles on and off the track.. Originating form Pretoria and in support of the youngest memeber on the team named BARENG.

Team Numbi

Team Numbi with the large number of supporters and various drivers. They have a rising talent that has claimed a young man by the name Samkeliso 'sam sam' Thubane, the proud owner of R250 000.00 in a competition in 2017 and the crown of KING OF SPIN. read all about "New King"

South Side Crew

Sounth Side crew, as the name states the Southern Part of Gauteng, Eldorando Park to be precise. The Crew is home for new comers ages 10-12. The oldest crew that is still around in todays day and age, however they are more of a brand, relating to merchandising and up and coming plans to have an online store for parts purchases.

Suntech Auto

Suntech Auto specialies in modifying and increasing perfomances vehicles specifally to BMW 325 range, from fuel management systems named DIKTATOR to dygnostics located in Benoni, East Rand. They also know for exceptional vehicle repaires and maintances. The famous Sunesh Gungadin Pursad BENONI is the man behind THE ROCK RACEWAY spinning events and Wicked Wednesdays along with his wife, whom managers these events. Mr.Sunesh Gungadin Pursad is a fan of the sport and one of the best spinners.

The ever Growing Sport gathers more and more support, about to become an offical sport that will be televised World Wide
